# numberOfItems

**Instance Property**

The number of items represented by the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var numberOfItems: Int { get }
```

## Getting the state of the scrubber

- **highlightedIndex**: The index of the highlighted item in the scrubber.
- **selectedIndex**: The index of the selected item in the scrubber.

items.description: The index of the highlighted item in the scrubber.
items.name: highlightedIndex

items.description: The index of the selected item in the scrubber.
